name: The ball (itch) (Dabrio)
description:
Do you like platformer games? Then give a try to The Ball. 

Try to pass the different traps to beat the levels. You can only play to get the goal or, if you want a challenger experience, maybe you should prove yourself to get the 3 stars on every level.

This game is in development, so that's why it only has the introduction level and the first level. Don't worry, my intention is to expand it with more levels or even add new worlds.
